Text.Page:
â€¦it's a book with a couple of pages torn away. The print has also gone through some tough time and became barely readable. However, some parts could be read. The handwriting is pretty but rushed. It does tell you that the author is not a patient person.

"Strike the ground three times to give a great impact around you. In an emergency,..."
"Multiple blows up ahead as fast as you could. 8 times is my personal best...."
"To sow the wind and reap the whirlwind. An eye for an eye, teeth, nose and ear, that is fair. But be patient in normal situations..."
"You must know how to control your anger. Let the anger gather inside you, greater your anger is, greater the damage you can give..."

Other parts are far too damaged to be read. The back of the book has been signed quite chaotically.
